text:
Oscars Double Down on DEI: Alters Long-Standing Humanitarian Award to Include 'Rectifying Inequities'. The Academy Awards is doubling down on its embrace of woke social justice activism and DEI. The latest change: the Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award -- a staple of the Oscars since the 1950s -- will now focus, at least in part, on equity.
The post Oscars Doubl…
